thread.title: UBS Hires Four Brokers Managing $870 Million Away From Merrill Lynch
thread.title_full: UBS Hires Four Brokers Managing $870 Million Away From Merrill Lynch - WSJ

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: UBS Hires Four Brokers Managing $870 Million Away From Merrill Lynch
text:
UBS Group AG’s U.S. wealth-management division has recruited four Merrill Lynch brokers who managed $870 million in client assets.
The advisers—Michael Carr, Kirk Ruth, Jeff Hogue and Jeff Rizzo—joined UBS last week and are working out of a newly opened branch office for the Swiss bank in Gainesville, Fla., a UBS spokesman said.
